WebCapture - Webpage Screenshot Tool

Installation:
1. Extract the zip file
2. Drag WebCapture.app to your Applications folder
3. Right-click on WebCapture.app and select "Open"
4. Click "Open" if prompted with a security warning

Requirements:
- macOS 10.13 or later
- Google Chrome browser

Usage:
1. Enter a website URL (e.g., example.com)
2. Choose output format (PNG, JPG, or PDF)
3. Set quality and other options as needed
4. Click "Capture Webpage"
5. Screenshots will be saved to your desktop by default

For support, dont contact me
